text: Mazharul Haq Shah Chowdhury is a Jatiya Party (Ershad) politician and the former Member of Parliament of Chittagong-4. ==Career== Chowdhury was elected to parliament from Chittagong-4 in 1988. In 2004, he was appointed Vice- Chairman of Jatiya Party. ==References== Category:Jatiya Party politicians Category:Living people Category:4th Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Mazharul Haq Shah Chowdhury
